name: Toro! Let's Party!
storyline: Toro continues to chase his dream to become a human after he left the player. One day, Kuro tells the white cat about the memory record which can grant any wish after you fill it with “gratitude”. So off Toro goes to help people. You will meet numerous people on your journey, help them solve their problems and have them thank you. Will you be able to grant Toro's wish at the end? The game is arranged in stories. Each story has a mini-game, you clear it to proceed toward the next story. Dress Toro and Kuro up as a chick, as a soccer player or give them an afro, with 30 types of mini games, gather friends around for rounds of cuteness. All the mini games on the disc are refinements of downloadable mini-games.
summary:
Toro! Let's Party! is a Video Game developed by SCE Japan Studio and BeXide, and published by Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

It was released on July 23, 2009 for the PlayStation 3, coinciding with the 10th Anniversary of the Doko Demo Issyo series. It is mainly a party game, though there is a prominent story mode in which mini games are unlocked as the story is progressed.

A different version was made that contained an English translation in other Asian countries, including Hong Kong, making it the first Doko Demo Issyo game that was officially released in Korean, Chinese, and English. The Japanese version of the game was re-released on the Japanese PlayStation Now, on September 15, 2015.
